user_query: I'm planning a vegan dinner party and need a recipe. Can you recommend a dish from the 'List of Foods' API? Then, provide me with a detailed recipe including the ingredients, method, and an image of the final dish.

TaskList.description: Request a vegan dish recommendation from the 'List of Foods' API.
Once the dish is recommended, retrieve detailed recipe information including ingredients and method using the Recipe API.
Fetch an image of the recommended dish using the Recipe API.
